name: Hell-icopter
description:
The fire in the forest got out of control. Only you can save the forest from complete destruction. Jump into your helicopter,rescue people, stop the fire and most importantly HAVE FUN!

Includes:

- Procedurally generated terrain

- 3 types of helicopters

- fire

-LOTS OF FIRE!!!

This game was submitted to GMTK 2020 game jam

If you encounter any bugs or you liked the game or you just want to write something, feel free to leave a comment ;).
